./external/basejump_stl/bsg_misc/bsg_array_concentrate_static.v Cov: 40% 

   1: module bsg_array_concentrate_static 
   2:   #(parameter pattern_els_p="inv"
   3:     , parameter width_p="inv"
   4:     , dense_els_lp=$bits(pattern_els_p)
   5:     , sparse_els_lp=`BSG_COUNTONES_SYNTH(pattern_els_p))
   6:   (input    [dense_els_lp-1:0][width_p-1:0] i
   7:    ,output [sparse_els_lp-1:0][width_p-1:0] o
   8: );
   9:    genvar j;
  10: 
  11:    if (pattern_els_p[0])
  12:      assign o[0]=i[0];
  13: 
  14:   for (j = 1; j < dense_els_lp; j=j+1)
  15:      begin : rof
  16:        if (pattern_els_p[j])
  17:          assign o[`BSG_COUNTONES_SYNTH(pattern_els_p[j-1:0])] = i[j];
  18:      end
  19: 
  20: endmodule
  21:
